author: Telly Davidson
title: Hulu Crowns Phyllis Schlafly Mrs. America
description: The firebrand mother of the Religious Right has always been a foil for the feminist left. But this new biopic could go deeper. The post Hulu Crowns Phyllis Schlafly Mrs. America appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: The firebrand mother of the Religious Right has always been a foil for the feminist left. But this new biopic could go deeper.FX on Hulu, a network known for its reenactments of post-war pop history like Fosse/Verdon, is tackling yet another touchstone: the w… [+7911 chars]
